name: KEYBALL
description:
1 KEYBOARD - 2  PLAYERS / TEAMS

Each player/team uses half the keyboard. 

This is a small "control scheme sandbox" or demo for people curious about playing a game with their whole keyboard.

This is just a tiny preview of a much fuller game with interesting puzzles, competitive and co-op, local and online multiplayer that I'm working on. That QWOP/ getting over it / rocket league mash-up that nobody asked for is on it's way. 

This buggy mess was made in 10 days by Christopher Shelley.
Wonderful music contributed by Christian Sheehan.
(no we're not the same person)

FEATURES:

6 dynamic elevation modes, different layouts and keyboard key caps to play around with.

CONTROLS : 

um... your whole keyboard ( if you don't have a QWERTY keyboard, let me know and I'll add your layout to the game )

SPECIAL KEYS:

SHIFT - hold down shift to invert your key movements, this allows for some extra control and trick shots
